title: Why does Riot microbuff things?
body:
stop microbuffing shit to trick people into playing them.

{{champion:5}}  + 9 hp at lvl 1 and 5 more per level.

at level 18 it is 94 hp.

if a ruby crystal is 400 gold and gives 150... it is about 250 gold in stats at level 18 as in 14ish gold per level in stats.

I know i shouldn't complain because it is a buff... but WTF? why even bother?

if you're gonna buff something... buff it, if you're gonna nerf something.. nerf it don't pussy foot around the issues.

also you can't take 10% of a champion's base auto attack damage and compensate with those ridiculous buffs on corki... lets remove his damage, and then make it easier to get away from the enemies he can't kill anymore!

I usually don't complain about patches, ESPECIALLY buffs... but seriously lol?

I feel like they are insulting my two of my favorite champions...
